org.modelio.api.diagram

Interface IDiagramService


  • public interface IDiagramService
    This interface gives an entry point to manipulate the Modelio diagrams.
    It also manages diagram customization and diagram styles.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IAutoDiagramFactory getAutoDiagramFactory()
      Get the auto diagram factory.
      IDiagramHandle getDiagramHandle(AbstractDiagram diagram)
      Get a diagram handle on 'diagram'.
      It opens a new diagram editor in Modelio, or select it if already opened.
      org.eclipse.gef.palette.PaletteEntry getRegisteredTool(String id)
      Get the palette tool from the given id.
      IStyleHandle getStyle(String name)
      Get an installed diagram styles from its name.
      List<IStyleHandle> listStyles()
      List all diagram styles that are currently installed.

    • Method Detail

      • getAutoDiagramFactory

        IAutoDiagramFactory getAutoDiagramFactory()
        Get the auto diagram factory.
        Returns:
        The auto diagram factory.
        Since:
        2.2

      • getStyle

        IStyleHandle getStyle(String name)
        Get an installed diagram styles from its name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the style to look for.
        Returns:
        The style with the given name, or null if it isn't installed.
        Since:
        2.2

      • listStyles

        List<IStyleHandle> listStyles()
        List all diagram styles that are currently installed.
        Returns:
        A list of styles. Might be empty, but not null.

      • registerStyle

        IStyleHandle registerStyle(String styleName,
                           String baseStyleName,
                           File styleData)
        Register a new named style along with its 'data' file.
        Parameters:
        styleName - then name of the style to register.
        baseStyleName - the cascaded style.
        styleData - the list of all properties defined in the style.
        Returns:
        then newly created IStyleHandle or null if the style could not be created. When the style already exists it is simply returned.

      • getDiagramHandle

        IDiagramHandle getDiagramHandle(AbstractDiagram diagram)
        Get a diagram handle on 'diagram'.
        It opens a new diagram editor in Modelio, or select it if already opened.
        Parameters:
        diagram - the AbstractDiagram to open.
        Returns:
        a diagram handle representing this diagram.

      • getRegisteredTool

        org.eclipse.gef.palette.PaletteEntry getRegisteredTool(String id)
        Get the palette tool from the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - An id.
        Returns:
        the found palette tool or null if none found.
